p:
Spatial SNP–gene pairs were queried in the genotype‐tissue expression (GTEx) database ( www.gtexportal.org, version 7
40 ) to identify spatial SNP–gene pairs with significant eQTLs (both cis‐acting and trans‐acting eQTL; false discovery rate (FDR) adjusted P < 0.05; Supplementary Fig. 1). Because of the tissue specificity of the GTEx database, it is possible to assign tissue specificity to the transcription changes.
